name: Clockers
tagline: Young drug pushers in the projects of Brooklyn live hard dangerous lives, trapped between their drug bosses and the detectives out to stop them.

name: Senseless
tagline: A student gets his senses enhanced by an experimental drug. But abuse is not an option.

name: Whip It
tagline: In Bodeen, Texas, an indie-rock loving misfit finds a way of dealing with her small-town misery after she discovers a roller derby league in nearby Austin.

name: I'm Gonna Git You Sucka
tagline: In this parody of blaxploitation movies, a black hero wannabe reunites former black heroes from the 70s to help him get revenge on Mr. Big.

name: How to Eat Fried Worms
tagline: During the first day of his new school year, a fifth grade boy squares off against a bully and winds up accepting a dare that could change the balance of power within the class.

name: The Crew
tagline: Four retired mobsters plan one last crime to save their retirement home.

name: They Live
tagline: A drifter discovers a pair of sunglasses that allow him to wake up to the fact that aliens have taken over the Earth.

name: House of Sand and Fog
tagline: An abandoned wife is evicted from her house and starts a tragic conflict with her home's new owners.

name: Stroker Ace
tagline: The title character, a popular NASCAR driver, clashes with the fried-chicken mogul that sponsors his racing team.

name: To Be or Not to Be
Real Genius
tagline: Teenage geniuses deal with their abilities while developing a laser.

name: The Wiz
tagline: An adaption of "The Wizard of Oz" that tries to capture the essence of the African American experience.

name: Religulous
tagline: Bill Maher's take on the current state of world religion.

name: The Quiet American

production.name: IMF Internationale Medien und Film GmbH & Co. 2. Produktions KG

tagline: An older British reporter vies with a young U.S. doctor for the affections of a beautiful Vietnamese woman.

name: Man's Best Friend
tagline: A dog turns from man's best friend into man's worst nightmare as he attacks everything that moves.

name: April Fool's Day
tagline: A group of nine college students staying at a friend's remote island mansion begin to fall victim to an unseen murderer over the April Fool's day weekend.

name: Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band
tagline: Small town band hits it big, but they must battle a nefarious plot in the music industry.

name: Volver
tagline: After her death, a mother returns to her home town in order to fix the situations she couldn't resolve during her life.

name: Gods and Generals
tagline: The rise and fall of legendary war hero Thomas "Stonewall" Jackson as he leads the Confederacy to great success against the Union from 1861 to 1863. Prequel to the 1993 classic "Gettysburg".

name: The Honeymooners

production.name: MMDP Munich Movie Development & Production GmbH & Co. Project KG

tagline: Working class New York bus driver Ralph Kramden is always coming up with get-rich-quick schemes for him and his best friend, Ed Norton, who's always around to help him get in (and out of) trouble.

name: Wicker Park
tagline: A young Chicago advertising executive believes a woman he sees in a café is his long-lost love. His conviction leads to obsession, as he puts his life on hold to trail her.

name: Black Dog
tagline: An ex-con takes a job driving a truck cross country. What he doesn't know is that the truck is filled with illegal weapons and now he must fight to survive and save his family.

name: Anna Karenina
tagline: In late-19th-century Russian high society, St. Petersburg aristocrat Anna Karenina enters into a life-changing affair with the dashing Count Alexei Vronsky.

name: Highlander: Endgame
tagline: Immortals Connor and Duncan Macleod must join forces against Kell, an evil immortal who has become too strong for anyone to face alone.

name: Shoot 'Em Up
tagline: A man named Mr. Smith delivers a woman's baby during a shootout, and is then called upon to protect the newborn from the army of gunmen.

name: Rachel Getting Married
tagline: A young woman who has been in and out from rehab for the past 10 years returns home for the weekend for her sister's wedding.

name: Mystic Pizza
tagline: Three teenage girls come of age while working at a pizza parlor in the Connecticut town of Mystic.

name: I Heart Huckabees
tagline: A husband-and-wife team play detective, but not in the traditional sense. Instead, the happy duo helps others solve their existential issues, the kind that keep you up at night, wondering what it all means.

name: Beasts of the Southern Wild
tagline: Faced with both her hot-tempered father's fading health and melting ice-caps that flood her ramshackle bayou community and unleash ancient aurochs, six-year-old Hushpuppy must learn the ways of courage and love.

name: Marvin's Room
tagline: A leukemia patient attempts to end a 20-year feud with her sister to get her bone marrow.

name: Weekend at Bernie's II
tagline: Larry and Richard use a voodoo revived corpse to track down hidden money to clear their names.

name: Labyrinth
tagline: Fifteen-year-old Sarah accidentally wishes her baby half-brother, Toby, away to the Goblin King Jareth who will keep Toby if Sarah does not complete his Labyrinth in thirteen hours.

name: The New World
tagline: The story of the English exploration of Virginia, and of the changing world and loves of Pocahontas.

name: The Pirates Who Don't Do Anything: A VeggieTales Movie
Mr. Nice Guy
tagline: A hitman by the name of Mr. Nice Guy is about to be married and his fiancee doesn't know his true profession. On top of that, his future father-in-law has a contract out on him. A zany mafia comedy!

name: Mr. Nice Guy
tagline: A Chinese chef accidentally gets involved with a news reporter who filmed a drug bust that went awry and is now being chased by gangs who are trying to get the video tape.

name: Everybody's All-American
tagline: A Louisiana football legend struggles to deal with life's complexities after his college career is over.

name: Jason X
tagline: Jason Voorhees returns with a new look, a new machete, and his same murderous attitude as he is awakened on a spaceship in the 25th century.

name: Winter's Tale
tagline: A burglar falls for an heiress as she dies in his arms. When he learns that he has the gift of reincarnation, he sets out to save her.

name: Under the Same Moon
tagline: A young Mexican boy travels to the U.S. to find his mother after his grandmother passes away.

name: House of 1000 Corpses
tagline: Two teenage couples traveling across the backwoods of Texas searching for urban legends of murder end up as prisoners of a bizarre and sadistic backwater family of serial killers.

name: An Education
tagline: A coming-of-age story about a teenage girl in 1960s suburban London, and how her life changes with the arrival of a playboy nearly twice her age.

name: The Matador

production.name: Equity Pictures Medienfonds GmbH & Co. KG II

tagline: A globetrotting hitman and a crestfallen businessman meet in a hotel bar in Mexico City in an encounter that draws them together in a way neither expected.

name: Silent House
tagline: A girl is trapped inside her family's lakeside retreat and becomes unable to contact the outside world as supernatural forces haunt the house with mysterious energy and consequences.

name: I Think I Love My Wife
tagline: A married man who daydreams about being with other women finds his will and morals tested after he's visited by the ex-mistress of his old friend.

name: Hellraiser III: Hell on Earth
tagline: An investigative reporter must send the newly unbound Pinhead and his legions back to Hell.

name: Freedomland
tagline: A black police detective must solve a strange case of a kidnapped boy and deal with a big racial protest.

name: Cirque du Soleil: Worlds Away
tagline: A young woman is entranced by an Aerialist. When they fall into the dreamlike world of Cirque du Soleil and are separated, they travel through the different tent worlds trying to find each other.

name: Black Mask
tagline: A survivor of a supersoldier project must fight his former comrades as a masked hero.

name: The Weather Man

production.name: Kumar Mobiliengesellschaft mbH & Co. Projekt Nr. 2 KG

tagline: A Chicago weather man, separated from his wife and children, debates whether professional and personal success are mutually exclusive.

name: Why Do Fools Fall in Love
tagline: Three women each claim to be the widow of 1950s doo-wop singer Frankie Lymon, claiming legal rights to his estate.

name: People Like Us
tagline: While settling his recently deceased father's estate, a salesman discovers he has a sister whom he never knew about, leading both siblings to re-examine their perceptions about family and life choices.

name: Evening
tagline: A drama exploring the romantic past and emotional present of Ann Grant and her daughters, Constance and Nina. As Ann lays dying, she remembers, and is moved to convey to her daughters, the defining moments in her life 50 years prior, when she was a young woman. Harris is the man Ann loves in the 1950s and never forgets.

name: Irreconcilable Differences
tagline: Alternating between the past and the present, a precocious little girl sues her selfish, career-driven parents for emancipation, surprising them both.

name: Undisputed
tagline: When heavyweight champion George 'Iceman' Chambers lands in prison, the resident gangster arranges a boxing match with the reigning prison champ.

name: Less Than Zero
tagline: A college freshman returns to L.A. for the holidays at his ex-girlfriend's request, but discovers that his former best friend has an out-of-control drug habit.

name: Ready to Rumble
tagline: Two slacker wrestling fans are devastated by the ousting of their favorite character by an unscrupulous promoter.

name: Mr. Wrong
tagline: A single and lonely woman finds the seemingly perfect man to date, but soon regrets it when his deranged and possessive other personality emerges and worst still, she cannot convince anyone else of his Jekyll/Hyde true nature.

name: Gattaca
tagline: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

name: No Mercy
tagline: An unconventional undercover Chicago cop and his partner are recruited to commit the murder of a New Orleans criminal kingpin.

name: Miss Pettigrew Lives for a Day
tagline: Guinevere Pettigrew, a middle-aged London governess, finds herself unfairly dismissed from her job. An attempt to gain new employment catapults her into the glamorous world and dizzying social whirl of an American actress and singer, Delysia Lafosse.

name: True Romance
tagline: Clarence marries hooker Alabama, steals cocaine from her pimp, and tries to sell it in Hollywood, while the owners of the coke try to reclaim it.

name: Casual Sex?
tagline: Two women friends, with quite different sexual histories, try visiting a health resort to look for a man to settle down with.

name: 12 Rounds
tagline: Detective Danny Fisher discovers his girlfriend has been kidnapped by a ex-con tied to Fisher's past, and he'll have to successfully complete 12 challenges in order to secure her safe release.

name: Confidence
tagline: Jake Vig (Burns) is a consummate grifter about to pull his biggest con yet, one set to avenge his friend's murder. But his last scam backfired, leaving him indebted to a mob boss (Hoffman) and his enforcer.

name: Little Big League
tagline: A young boy is bequeathed the ownership of a professional baseball team.

name: Envy
tagline: A man becomes increasingly jealous of his friend's newfound success.

name: How the West Was Won
tagline: A family saga covering several decades of Westward expansion in the nineteenth century--including the Gold Rush, the Civil War, and the building of the railroads.

name: Judgment Night
tagline: Three friends on their way to a boxing match get caught in heavy traffic, so they take a shortcut in order to get their faster, unfortunately it leads to them witnessing a murder which leaves them running for their lives.

name: Let Me In
tagline: A bullied young boy befriends a young female vampire who lives in secrecy with her guardian.

name: Saving Grace
tagline: A small-town English widow, facing financial troubles after her husband's suicide, turns to agriculture of an illegal kind.

name: Roommates
tagline: An elderly yet young-at-heart man moves in with his grandson, and both their lives turn upside-down.

name: Soul Men
tagline: Though it's been some twenty years since they have spoken with one another, two estranged soul-singing legends agree to participate in a reunion performance at the Apollo Theater to honor their recently deceased band leader.

name: Holy Man
tagline: Eddie Murphy stars as an over-the-top television evangelist who finds a way to turn television home shopping into a religious experience, and takes America by storm.
